de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter

Class PreferenceHeaderAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter

  • public class PreferenceHeaderAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    An adapter, which provides instances of the class PreferenceHeader for visualization using a list view.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder
      The view holder, which is used by the adapter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PreferenceHeaderAdapter(Context context)
      Creates a new adapter, which provides instances of the class PreferenceHeader to be used for visualization via a list view.

      • PreferenceHeaderAdapter

        public PreferenceHeaderAdapter(Context context)
        Creates a new adapter, which provides instances of the class PreferenceHeader to be used for visualization via a list view.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the adapter, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • getViewId

        public final int getViewId()
        Returns the resource id of the view, which is used to visualize the adapter's items.
        Returns:
        The resource id of the view, which is used to visualize the adapter's items, as an Integer value

      • setViewId

        public final void setViewId(int viewId)
        Sets the resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the adapter's items.
        Parameters:
        viewId - The resource id, which should be set, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid layout resource

      • getSelectorId

        public final int getSelectorId()
        Returns the resource id of the selector, which is used as the background of the view, which is used to visualize the adapter's items.
        Returns:
        The resource id of the selector, which is used as the background of the view, which is used to visualize the adapter's items, as an Integer value

      • setSelectorId

        public final void setSelectorId(int selectorId)
        Sets the resource id of the selector, which should be used as the background of the view, which is used to visualize the adapter's items.
        Parameters:
        selectorId - The resource id, which should be set, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid drawable resource

        public final void addListener(AdapterListener listener)
        Adds a new listener, which should be notified, when the underlying data of the adapter has been changed, to the adapter.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be added, as an instance of the type AdapterListener. The listener may not be null

      • removeListener

        public final void removeListener(AdapterListener listener)
        Removes a specific listener, which should not be notified anymore, when the underlying data of the adapter has been changed, from the adapter.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be removed, as an instance of the type AdapterListener. The listener may not be null

      • addDecorator

        public final void addDecorator(PreferenceHeaderDecorator decorator)
        Adds a new decorator, which should be applied, when an item of the adapter is visualized, to the adapter.
        Parameters:
        decorator - The decorator, which should be added, as an instance of the type PreferenceHeaderDecorator. The decorator may not be null

      • addItem

        public final void addItem(PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader)
        Adds a new preference header to the adapter.
        Parameters:
        preferenceHeader - The preference header, which should be added, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader. The preference header may not be null

      • addAllItems

        public final void addAllItems(Collection<PreferenceHeader> preferenceHeaders)
        Adds all preference headers, which are contained by a specific collection, to the adapter.
        Parameters:
        preferenceHeaders - The collection, which contains the preference headers, which should be added, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if no preference headers should be added

      • removeItem

        public final boolean removeItem(PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader)
        Removes a specific preference header from the adapter.
        Parameters:
        preferenceHeader - The preference header, which should be removed, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader. The preference header may not be null
        Returns:
        True, if the preference item has been removed, false otherwise

      • clear

        public final void clear()
        Removes all preference headers from the adapter.

      • getAllItems

        public final ArrayList<PreferenceHeader> getAllItems()
        Returns a collection, which contains all items of the adapter.
        Returns:
        A collection, which contains all items of the adapter, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if the adapter does not contain any items

      • indexOf

        public final int indexOf(PreferenceHeader item)
        Returns the index, a specific preference header belongs to.
        Parameters:
        item - The preference header, whose index should be returned, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader. The preference header may not be null
        Returns:
        The index of the given preference header as an Integer value or -1 , if the adapter does not contain the preference header

      • setEnabled

        public final void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets, whether the items of the adapter should be enabled, or not.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True, if the items of the adapter should be enabled, false otherwise
